mapper.sql: select board_id, conts, cdt, vw_cnt from bow_board
mapper.select: select board_id, titl, conts, cdt, vw_cnt, usr, cmt_cnt, atch_file_cnt, is_del from bow_board where board_id = #{value}
mapper.update: update bow_board set vw_cnt = vw_cnt + 1 where board_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into bow_board( titl, conts, usr, pwd ) values( #{title}, #{contents}, #{user}, password(#{password}) )
mapper.select: select count(*) from bow_board where board_id = #{no} and pwd = password(#{password})
